---
name: GAL1_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae GAL1 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the GAL1 gene encoding galactokinase in S. cerevisiae. This promoter is strongly induced by galactose and repressed by glucose, providing tight regulation for galactose-inducible expression.
